jobTitle: Data Analyst - Fixed Income Municipals Analytics Group
jobDescription: Job Description What is the opportunity?  This data analyst will have the opportunity to work in the Front Office for an industry leading broker/dealer in the Fixed Income Municipals Analytics group of the institutional Municipals Sales and Trading division. From your first day on the job, you'll be given specific responsibilities that impact the business right away.  What will you do? Run data analytics on the Municipals algorithmic trading platform and the Municipals marketCreate visualizations to illustrate analyticsWork with strategists to identify trends and improve strategic approach to algorithmic tradingAssist in design of big data pricing models; handle feature engineering and ETL jobs in PythonCollaborate with senior strategists, senior management, traders, data scientists, analysts and developersProactively identify operational risks/ control deficiencies in the businessReview and comply with Firm Policies applicable to your business activitiesEscalate operational risk loss events, control deficiencies and risks that you identify to your line manager and the relevant risk and control functions on a timely basis. What do you need to succeed?  Must-have Strong data profiling, cleaning, and mining expertise. Ability to perform complex data analysis on large volumes of data and present findings to stakeholders.Strong skills in Python, including data analytics libraries like SKLearn, Tensorflow, SPARK.
